nodes.text: The Bane Back spider was a creature native to the planet Dathomir. At least three were known to have been seen near the Spider Clan Cave. Its carapace was known to have been used as a trophy.

Bane Back spiders appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
